#SiapParamSet
VERSION="2.0" "SIAP protocol version"
REQUEST="accessData" "Operation to be performed"
POS="282.1,67.12;ICRS" "Central coordinates of search region"
SIZE="0.1" "Size (width[,height]) of the search region"
BAND="8.0e-04/1.209e-6;source" "Spectral bandpass of the search region"
TIME=null "Range of times for the search region"
POL=null "Polarization types of interest"
FORMAT="fits" "Allowable output data formats"
RESPONSEFORMAT=null "Format of query response"
MODE="cutout" "Query mode"
REGION=null "STC-S region specification"
INTERSECT=null "Specifies how image footprint may overlap ROI"
SPECRES="2000.0" "Minimum spectral resolution"
SPECRP=null "Spectral resolving power"
SPATRES=null "Minimum spatial resolution"
TIMERES=null "Minimum temporal resolution"
FLUXLIMIT=null "Maximum RMS noise level"
TargetName=null "Target name"
TargetClass=null "Target class names to search for"
ASTCalib=null "Minimum level of astrometric calibration"
FluxCalib=null "Minimum level of flux calibration"
TYPE=null "Dataset type"
SUBTYPE=null "Dataset subtype"
PubDID=null "Publisher-assigned dataset identifier"
CreatorDID=null "Creator-assigned dataset identifier"
Collection=null "Data collection name or pattern"
TOP=null "Number of top-ranked items to return"
MAXREC=null "Maximum number of output records"
MODTIME=null "Range of modification times"
COMPRESS="true" "Allow dataset compression"
RUNID=null "Runtime job ID string"
